Ubique House, 768, Purbachal Road, Kalikapur, Kolkata, West Bengal 700 107, IN
33 UBI Avenue 3 #08-68, Vertex, Tower A, Singapore, 408868, SG
Gammel Koge Landevej 890, DK-2665,, Vallensbaek Strand, Denmark., Copenhagen, DK
Al Swan - Amberjem Tower E1, Office E1-1521 E, Shiek Khalifa Bin Zayed St, Ajman - United Arab Emirates, Dubai, AE
jobsdata.linkedin_org_description:
Ubique Systems is a fast growing multifaceted organization which offers a comprehensive array of outsourcing and consulting services for its customers, including recruitment, human resource management, vendor management, and outplacement services and software development on a global basis, with an objective to adopt the flexible global business practices that today enable companies to operate more efficiently and produce more value.

We‚Äôre a global leader in business and technology services, helping our clients bring the future of work to life. Ubique is one of the world‚Äôs leading organizations providing management consulting, technology and outsourcing services. Our team, selected by a rigorous process of monitoring academic excellence and work experience, is led by strong global management individuals, to fulfill demands put forward to us, and consistently deliver in adherence to our value proposition. A scientific process oriented approach helps augment the delivery and quality.

Ubique Systems commenced operations in 2000, when the IT services industry was deemed to be well established and the offshore concept was gaining ground. Today relying on their belief about collaboration and professional integrity the group has managed to grow to strength of more than 1500 consultants. Now, with a multinational presence and a comprehensive range of services across diverse industries, Ubique Systems is one of the reliable consulting partners with a growth rate of more than 80 % year on year.

jobsdata.linkedin_org_description:
We work with our clients to apply a proven system in a way that represents our customers through unique and enjoyable interactions. Which, in turn, results in additional sales-qualified-leads. Our mission is to develop skilled sales individuals who represent our customers through unique and enjoyable interactions.
